title: This 20-Year-Old College Student Just Smashed the Pan-American Highway World Record
content:
Bond Almand left Prudhoe Bay, Alaska on August 31 and arrived in Ushuaia, Argentina on November 15, besting the previous record by just under nine days.

Read the full article at This 20-Year-Old College Student Just Smashed the Pan-American Highway World Record on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
